title: Understanding the Print Area
text: Before printing a specific section of a worksheet, you need to define the print area. This tells the printer which part of the worksheet to print.

title: Selecting the Range
text: To print a specific section, first select the range of cells you want to print. This can be done by clicking and dragging over the cells.

title: Setting the Print Area
text: After selecting the range, go to the Page Layout tab and click on 'Print Area'. Then, choose 'Set Print Area'.

hintAnswer: same steps as the overall worksheet, but select the range of cells you want to print first
title: Printing the Selected Range
text: Once the print area is set, proceed to print the worksheet. The printer will only print the selected range.
choices: same steps as the overall worksheet, but select the range of cells you want to print first
delete the part of the worksheet you don't want to print
$$copy-paste$$ the portion you want to print into Office
